summary.span: 顯示使用者輸入的文字方塊控制項。

span.span: Displays a text box control for user input.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 伺服器控制項是可讓使用者輸入文字輸入的控制項。The server control is an input control that lets the user enter text. 根據預設，控制項的屬性設定為`TextBoxMode.SingleLine`，其中顯示單行文字方塊。By default, the property of the control is set to `TextBoxMode.SingleLine`, which displays a single-line text box. 不過，您也可以使用控制項來顯示多行文字方塊或遮罩的值變更的使用者輸入的文字方塊屬性`TextBoxMode.MultiLine`或`TextBoxMode.Password`分別。However, you can also use the control to display a multiline text box or a text box that masks user input by changing the value of the property to `TextBoxMode.MultiLine` or `TextBoxMode.Password`, respectively. 中顯示的文字指定或取決於使用控制項屬性。The text displayed in the control is specified or determined by using the property. 控制項包含數個屬性，讓您控制控制項的外觀。The control contains several properties that allow you to control the appearance of the control. 文字方塊中，以字元為單位的顯示寬度由其屬性。The display width of the text box, in characters, is determined by its property. 如果控制項是多行文字方塊中，它會顯示的資料列數目由屬性。If the control is a multiline text box, the number of rows it displays is determined by the property. 若要顯示自動換行內的文字控制，請設定屬性`true`。To display text that wraps within the control, set the property to `true`. 您也可以指定在輸入資料的方式藉由設定一些屬性的控制項。You can also specify how data is entered in the control by setting a few properties. 若要避免修改控制項中顯示的文字，將屬性`true`。To prevent the text displayed in the control from being modified, set the property to `true`. 如果您想要限制使用者輸入，以指定的字元數，設定屬性。If you want to limit the user input to a specified number of characters, set the property. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可接受使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to accept user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423). 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來取得使用者輸入的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 當使用者按一下**新增**顯示按鈕，在文字方塊中輸入值的總和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

TextBox Example

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了協助資料輸入，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 和更新版本以及一些其他瀏覽器支援功能，稱為 「 自動完成 」。To assist with data entry, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 and later and some other browsers support a feature referred to as AutoComplete. 「 自動完成 」 監視的文字方塊中，並建立一份使用者所輸入的值。AutoComplete monitors a text box and creates a list of values entered by the user. 當使用者在稍後返回文字方塊中時，會顯示清單。When the user returns to the text box at a later time, the list is displayed. 不需要重新輸入先前輸入的值，使用者只要選取值從這個清單。Instead of retyping a previously entered value, the user can simply select the value from this list. 使用屬性，即可控制的自動完成功能的行為控制項。Use the property to control the behavior of the AutoComplete feature for a control. 列舉型別用來表示的值，您可以套用到屬性。The enumeration is used to represent the values that you can apply to the property. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有瀏覽器都支援自動完成 」 功能。Not all browsers support the AutoComplete feature. 請洽詢您的瀏覽器，以判斷相容性。Check with your browser to determine compatibility. 根據預設，屬性控制設為 `AutoCompleteType.None`。By default, the property for a control is set to `AutoCompleteType.None`. 使用此設定，控制項與其他共用清單控制具有相同在不同頁面的屬性。With this setting, the control shares the list with other controls with the same property across different pages. 您也可以共用清單之間控制項類別目錄為基礎，而不是屬性。You can also share a list between controls based on a category, instead of an property. 當您將類別目錄值的其中一個屬性 (例如`AutoCompleteType.FirstName`，`AutoCompleteType.LastName`等等)，則所有控制項相同的類別目錄和共用相同的清單。When you set the property to one of the category values (such as `AutoCompleteType.FirstName`, `AutoCompleteType.LastName`, and so on), all controls with the same category share the same list. 您可以停用的自動完成功能藉由設定控制屬性`AutoCompleteType.Disabled`。You can disable the AutoComplete feature for a control by setting the property to `AutoCompleteType.Disabled`. 瀏覽器文件中設定及啟用的自動完成功能的詳細資訊，請參閱。Refer to your browser documentation for details on configuring and enabling the AutoComplete feature. 例如，若要啟用自動完成 」 功能，在 Internet Explorer 5 或更新版本中的，選取**網際網路選項**從**工具** 功能表，然後選取**內容**索引標籤。按一下**自動完成**來檢視和修改的自動完成功能的各種不同的瀏覽器選項按鈕。For example, to enable the AutoComplete feature in Internet Explorer version 5 or later, select **Internet Options** from the **Tools** menu, and then select the **Content** tab. Click the **AutoComplete** button to view and modify the various browser options for the AutoComplete feature. 如需在 Internet Explorer 中的自動完成功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[於 HTML 表單中使用自動完成](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163828)中[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about the AutoComplete feature in Internet Explorer, see [Using AutoComplete in HTML Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163828) in the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉以指定的自動完成分類控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to specify the AutoComplete category for a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[AutoCompleteType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoCompleteType/CS/AutoCompleteTypecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AutoCompleteType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoCompleteType/VB/AutoCompleteTypevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否會發生自動回傳至伺服器時控制項遺失駐點。Use the property to specify whether an automatic postback to the server will occur when the control loses focus. 按下 ENTER 或 TAB 鍵時在控制項是最常見的方式，將焦點變更。Pressing the ENTER or the TAB key while in the control is the most common way to change focus. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項的父容器包含標示為預設按鈕的按鈕 (例如，如果容器的或屬性設定)，預設按鈕的`Click`不會引發以回應事件自動回傳。If the control's parent container contains a button marked as the default button (for example, if the container's or property is set), the default button's `Click` event is not raised in response to the automatic postback. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，會自動顯示在文字方塊中輸入值的總和方塊時控制項遺失駐點。The following example shows how to use the property to automatically display the sum of the values entered in the text boxes when the control loses focus. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否要在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時控制設為在回傳時進行驗證。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is set to validate when a postback occurs. 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 根據預設，控制項不會造成頁面驗證控制項遺失焦點時。By default, a control does not cause page validation when the control loses focus. 若要設定控制項驗證回傳發生時，請設定屬性`true`和屬性`true`。To set the control to validate when a postback occurs, set the property to `true` and the property to `true`. 時的值屬性設定為`true`，您也可以使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的驗證。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

## Remarks 使用屬性來限制可輸入中的字元數控制項。Use the property to limit the number of characters that can be entered in the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是時才適用屬性設定為`TextBoxMode.SingleLine`或`TextBoxMode.Password`。This property is applicable only when the property is set to `TextBoxMode.SingleLine` or `TextBoxMode.Password`. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423). 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來取得使用者輸入的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 當使用者按一下**新增**顯示按鈕，在文字方塊中輸入值的總和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字方塊的內容發佈至伺服器期間變更時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > A控制項必須保存發佈至這個事件，才能正確運作的伺服器之間的某些值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 請務必對這個控制項已啟用檢視狀態。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使其永遠標示自訂為已修改的伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always marks a custom server control as having been modified. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否內容控制項可以變更。Use the property to specify whether the contents of the control can be changed. 此屬性設定為`true`會防止使用者輸入的值或變更現有的值。Setting this property to `true` will prevent users from entering a value or changing the existing value. 請注意，使用者控制項無法變更此屬性; 只有開發人員可以。Note that the user of the control cannot change this property; only the developer can. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值用來控制屬性設定為`true`傳送到伺服器時，會回傳，但伺服器不會對唯讀文字方塊進行任何處理。The value of a control with the property set to `true` is sent to the server when a postback occurs, but the server does no processing for a read-only text box. 這可防止惡意使用者變更是唯讀的值。This prevents a malicious user from changing a value that is read-only. 值回傳之間的檢視狀態中，會保留屬性，除非伺服器端程式碼修改了。The value of the property is preserved in the view state between postbacks unless modified by server-side code. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以防止中顯示的文字的任何變更控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent any changes to the text displayed in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來文字方塊檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the text box view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 檢視狀態變更的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與物件相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值，然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control's life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[IIS 5.0 和 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Application Life Cycle Overview for IIS 5.0 and 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f). 儲存檢視狀態時，這個字串物件會傳回至用戶端為儲存在隱藏的 HTML input 項目中的變數。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率`ViewState`屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷中顯示的文字控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the text displayed in the control. 若要限制的控制項所接受的字元數，設定屬性。To limit the number of characters accepted by the control, set the property. 如果您想要防止修改的文字，設定屬性。If you want to prevent the text from being modified, set the property. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 轉譯文字方塊時，此屬性的內容是以 HTML 編碼。When the text box is rendered, the contents of this property are HTML-encoded. 比方說，如果您將此屬性設定為"\ 測試\"，瀏覽器會顯示"\ 測試 \< /b >"，沒有 「 測試 」 以粗體顯示。For example, if you set this property to "\Test\", the browser will display "\Test\", not "Test" in bold. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來取得使用者輸入的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 當使用者按一下**新增**顯示按鈕，在文字方塊中輸入值的總和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

summary.span: 發生於文字方塊的內容在發佈至伺服器期間變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字方塊的內容發佈至伺服器期間變更時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server. 如果文字會變更的使用者，才會引發事件如果文字以程式設計方式變更，不會引發此事件。The event is only raised if the text is changed by the user; the event is not raised if the text is changed programmatically. > [!NOTE] > A控制項必須保存發佈至這個事件，才能正確運作的伺服器之間的某些值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 請務必對這個控制項已啟用檢視狀態。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用此事件，以及在回應中的變更控制項。The following example shows how you can use this event to respond to changes in the control. 程式碼會顯示的內容TextBox 控制項 （稱為 TextBox1） （稱為 Label1） 標籤中的屬性時`Text`屬性變更。The code displays the contents of the property of a TextBox control (called TextBox1) in a label (called Label1) when the `Text` property is changed. Web Form 網頁中的使用者輸入可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。User input in a Web Forms page can include potentially malicious client script. 根據預設，Web Form 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, the Web Forms page validates that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)。For more information, see [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b). ```vb Protected Sub TextBox1_TextChanged(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles TextBox1.TextChanged Label1.Text = Server.HtmlEncode(TextBox1.Text) End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void TextBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { Label1.Text = Server.HtmlEncode(TextBox1.Text); } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定如何顯示控制項。Use the property to specify how a control is displayed. 一般選項有三個單一線條、 多行或密碼 文字方塊。Three common options are single-line, multiline, or password text box. 當控制項是多行模式中，您可以藉由設定顯示的資料列數目來控制屬性。When the control is in multiline mode, you can control the number of rows displayed by setting the property. 您也可以指定文字應換行藉由設定屬性。You can also specify whether the text should wrap by setting the property. 如果控制項是密碼模式中，輸入控制項中的所有字元都會加上都遮罩。If the control is in password mode, all characters entered in the control are masked. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定多行文字方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a multiline text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以在頁面上的其他驗證群組從獨立進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此屬性沒有作用時，才屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值和屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的文字是否以多行顯示控制項自動時，會繼續在下一行文字到達控制項的結尾。Use the property to specify whether the text displayed in a multiline control automatically continues on the next line when the text reaches the end of the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是時才適用屬性設定為`TextBoxMode.MultiLine`。This property is applicable only when the property is set to `TextBoxMode.MultiLine`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中輸入的文字應換行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to wrap text entered in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
